column4: #flood "i need some help to install kylix 2 open edition on a ubuntu linux"
seveas, i need to know how to install kylix 2 open edition on ubuntu, because they came on rpm version
and don't work after the installation
there is a way to transform a rpm into a deb package?
yes, but it's not guaranteed to work
well, like the things you need to know...
rpms are bad, better get the source and compile it
kylix does not support Ubuntu, Ubuntu does not support kylix, You might need red hat for it to be supportd
you may have luck with alien (converting rpm to deb)
